OrgName.entry: YOUTH OFFENDING SERVICE LOCAL YOUTH OFFENDER PANELS

Desc.entry: Recruits volunteers aged 18 years and over to sit on local Youth Offender Panels. The panels consider information gathered from the young person and his/her family and the victim to determine how to repair the harm caused by the offence. Self or any referral.

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE - WELFARE AND SOCIAL INCLUSION
